entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain mixed with snow in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind south 30 km/h. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 9.
